game.name: The Liminal Dimension
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, Simulation
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet, Family Sharing, Steam Timeline
game.shortDescription: 당신은 리미널 차원 내에서 끝없는 루프에 갇혀 있으며, 각 루프는 점점 더 불안한 장소로 이어집니다. 이 심리적 공포에서 탈출할 수 있을까요? 이 게임은 현실과 환상 사이의 경계를 흐릿하게 만드는 독특한 déjà vu 경험을 제공합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You're trapped in an endless loop within a liminal dimension, where each loop leads to increasingly unsettling places. Will you find the way out of this psychological horror? The game offers a unique déjà vu experience that blurs the lines between reality and illusion.

reviewHighlights.text: a weird little hidden gem, short and nice! outside of some screen tearing; the game runs pretty smoothly, and despite some questionable achievements:...
It was a good hour of entertainment. I'm so angry that it's not longer. That means it was good
